mapper.select: select eh.eno, eh.dvno, eh.dvappname, eh.dvappdate, ac.divname, de.briefs, de.price, eh.dvamt from erp.expendhistory as eh Inner Join erp.detailexpend as de on de.dvno = eh.dvno Inner Join erp.accountcode as ac on ac.divcd = de.divcd where eno = #{eno}

select ac.divname , sum(eh.dvamt) as 'total_divcd_price' from erp.expendhistory as eh inner join erp.payrollhistory as pr on pr.paysequence = eh.paysequence inner join erp.accountcode as ac on ac.divcd = pr.divcd where (date(eh.dvappdate) between #{start} and #{end}) group by ac.divcd union select ac.divname ,sum(eh.dvamt) as 'total_divcd_price' from erp.expendhistory as eh inner join erp.detailexpend as de on de.dvno = eh.dvno inner join erp.accountcode as ac on ac.divcd = de.divcd where (date(eh.dvappdate) between #{start} and #{end}) group by ac.divcd
